title: Edit Distance Again
text:
As any experienced programmer must know the famous problem of "Edit Distance", however this problem is considered an “alternating chain” if you have alternately made case sensitive.Example:"AaAaAbB" "B" "a" "aBaCdEf"Alternating chains are considered in our problem.We only have one operation that is permitted in exchange for a lower or upper case Latin letter.Given a string giving the minimum number of changes to be considered an alternating chain.InputA string with no spaces line containing only uppercase and lowercase letters, one for each line of maximum length 1000 until end of fileOutputFor each line print the minimum number of changes to the chain is a "chain alternately"ExampleInput:AaAaB
ABaa
aOutput:0
2
0
